item.description:
RSVP NOT REQUIRED - THIS IS NOT A GBSC HOSTED EVENT

For the latest updates see: http://autos.groups.y...

RIPPINEST TOWN RALLY IV

Idle Barons M.C. & The Turnbull Athletic Club
present
RIPPIN'EST TOWN
RALLY IV: MODS v. ROCKERS
JULY 18 & 19, 2008
BOSTON, MASS.

OFFICIAL HOTEL:

Howard Johnson Inn Fenway Park Boston 1271 Boylston
Street I-90 & Boylston Boston, MA, 02215 US
617-267-8300

THE PLACE IS A CLASSIC AND HAS A SWIMMING POOL & AN
EXCELLENT CHINESE RESTAURANT & LOUNGE!!! RESERVE A
ROOM TO-DAY!!!

FRIDAY - JULY 18, 2008:

MEET-AND-GREET w/ LIVE MUSIC
8:00 p.m. @ THE BASEBALL TAVERN
(directly across the street from HOJO's HOTEL)

featuring D.J. FORD E. BUXWORTH

----------------------

SATURDAY - JULY 19, 2008:

FREE BREAKFAST & GROUP-RIDE
11:00 a.m. @ HOWARD JOHNSON in FENWAY
(directly across the street from THE BASEBALL TAVERN)

w/ EMERALD NECKLACE LOOP & MUSEUM of TRANPORTATION

GROUP-RIDE LEAVES AT NOON!


MONSTER BARBECUE & AWARD CEREMONY
5:00 p.m. @ GREAT SCOTT!
1222 COMMONWEALTH AVENUE - ALLSTON
TROPHIES TO:
BEST VESPA - BEST LAMBRETTA
BEST EUROPEAN MOTORCYCLE - BEST AMERICAN MOTORCYCLE
BEST ASIAN MOTORCYCLE - BEST MOPED-CLASS CYCLE

OFFICIAL HOTEL:

Howard Johnson Inn Fenway Park Boston 1271 Boylston
Street I-90 & Boylston Boston, MA, 02215 US
617-267-8300

THE PLACE IS A CLASSIC AND HAS A SWIMMING POOL & AN
EXCELLENT CHINESE RESTAURANT & LOUNGE!!! RESERVE A
ROOM TO-DAY!!!

______________________
Ford Curran
Turnbull Athletic Club
Boston, Mass.
(781)36-DIRTY
